OBJECTIVE:

To seek a challenging career which allows me to grow and learn to use my knowledge, analytical ability, communication skills and creativity in the best possible innovative ways. 

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:

· Associate  at  EY Global Delivery Services  India LLP (6 May 2019- Present)
Working in the data analytics team as an Alteryx certified data engineer and creating dashboards using reporting tools like Power BI. Also involved in data preparation and extraction using Alteryx with SQL Server as the database to create data model for KPI reports.

· Senior analyst  at  Capgemini Technology Services India (December 2017- 2 May 2019)
Working in the business intelligence domain as an ETL and certified Tableau developer and creating dashboards using reporting tools like Tableau. Trained in Cognos, Teradata, Informatica & Microstrategy and achieved rank 2 in L1 certification based on this training.

Project: BHGE CoQ Analytics (April 2018 – May 2019)
Client: Baker Hughes (GE Oil & Gas)
Roles & Responsibilities:
· Requirement gathering in the form of excels, PPTs and Mock-ups.
· Effective and Interactive Dashboard development as per the Business requirements by implementing best practices.
· Building reports using	various	reporting objects such as calculated fields, parameters, sets, groups, filters etc.
· Handling different types of Data sources and convert them to various formats to get analytical insights from the data.
· Implemented various complex calculations to get the desired output.
· Perform Unit testing on the reports built and closely coordinating with the UAT & testing team in fixing the bugs raised.
· Good knowledge on Tableau server like publishing, refreshing and monitoring of Tableau reports.
· Following Agile methodology and conduct on site interactions to get requirements and demonstrate the reports developed.
· Develop DDLs and Greenplum(database) function scripts for the tables used for building reports.
· Working on Talend to create & schedule jobs to load data into datalake tables & monitor these data loads.
· Complete knowledge on end to end project implementation. 

 ACADEMIC QUALIFICATIONS:

I have completed B.Tech. in Computer Science & Engineering (CSE) from Amity University, Noida.

C.G.P.A- 7.67

Ahlcon Public School, Delhi Xth C.B.S.E – 89.3%
XIIth C.B.S.E-79.8%

ETL- Alteryx, Informatica PowerCenter 9.6.0, Talend 

Reporting Tools- Tableau, IBM Cognos 11, Power BI 

Databases- Oracle, Teradata, Greenplum, SQL Server

Tools - MS Excel, MS Word, MS Powerpoint, SoapUI

ACADEMIC PROJECT DETAILS:

· Term paper on Computer Networks (2014)

· Designed Android application for route planning in Delhi (2015)

· Intern-Finance at Concentrix Daksh Services India Private Limited (2016)

CONFERENCES/WORKSHOPS ATTENDED:

1. Attended International Conference, Confluence, on “Mega Trends of IT”, held at Amity University, Uttar Pradesh, Noida from September 26-27, 2013.

2. Attended International Conference, Confluence, on “Cloud Security and Big Data”, held at Amity University, Uttar Pradesh, Noida from September 25-26, 2014.

3. Attended and participated in "Microsoft Wearable and Kinect Technology" event conducted by Amity Microsoft Technology Club on October 30th 2014 at Amity University Uttar Pradesh, Noida.

4. Attended and participated in Pre-Summit Workshop Envoyage conducted in Amity University, Noida by The Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Bombay as a part of The Entrepreneurship Summit 2015. 

5. Attended Special Lecture on “Preparing for the Web of Things” by America’s First World Wide Web Expert Prof. (Dr.) Bebo White, Departmental Associate at Stanford University, US as a part of 3rd Distinguished Lecture Series conducted by Amity ACM Student Chapter on March 12th 2015 at Amity University Uttar Pradesh, Noida.

6. Attended Special Lecture by Dr. P.K Gupta-Specialty Strategy Theatre Lead, Asia Pacific and Japan, EMC Corporation on “Digital Transformation in the age of Cloud, Big Data, Mobile and Social” conducted by EMC Club and Amity ACM Student Chapter on March 25th 2015 at Amity University Uttar Pradesh, Noida.

7. ABP-INFOCOM 2015 Delhi edition which took place at India Habitat Centre on 16th and 17th of July 2015.The theme was "Connected World".

ACHIEVEMENTS AND CERTIFICATIONS:

1. Alteryx Core Certified title awarded by Alteryx (28/06/2019- 28/06/2021). 

2. Tableau Desktop Certified Associate title awarded by Tableau (01/08/2018-01/08/2020).

4. Cleared DELF JA2 in August 2011 with a score of 77/100.

The Diplôme d'études en langue française (DELF) is one of the diplomas, valid for lifetime, awarded by the French Ministry of Education to prove the French-language skills of non-French candidates.

5. Certificate of Merit and cash prize awardee for 1st International English Olympiad by Science Olympiad Foundation (SOF) in collaboration with the British Council in March 2011.

6. Certificate of Merit for securing highest grade in Math & Science at AISSE-2011 by Ahlcon Public School Principal in October 2011.

Career Brief:
Software Developer with 4-years of experience in Design and development of software systems using Microsoft Technologies such as SQL Server 2008 R2, SSRS, SSIS, C#.
EXPERTISE                        
 PROFILE

	Banking and Finance  Domain



	
	· 4 years of experience in development and implementation of various applications including Web and Client/Server Application development 
· RDBMS skills with good knowledge of Design, and Database Management Concepts.
· Good knowledge of SQL and scripting experience in coding Stored Procedures,  Functions, Triggers, View etc using MS SQL Server.
· Experience in creating Reports like PieCharts, Tablix, Matrix, Bars etc using SSRS.

· Created Jobs on SSIS using various components like Loop Containers, Conditionals Splits, Data Conversions, Execute SQL Task etc.
· Interacting with Client side people to solve issues and update status.
· Goal-oriented, multi-tasking professional with critical thinking, good troubleshooting, problem analysis and resolution.
· Good communication, analytical and interpersonal skills; ability to perform as part of a team.
· Ability to grasp and apply new concepts quickly and effectively.



TECHNICAL SKILLS: 


Development Tools

:
Visual Studio 2013
RDBMS


:
SSMS
Language/Environment
:
SQL Server, SSIS, SSRS
ORGANIZATIONAL EXPRERIENCE: 



October 2015 – Present with NIIT Technologies, Greater Noida as Senior Software Engineer.
 PROJECTS: 


· Project            : Service Performance Management (SPM)
Duration         : Nov 2015 – Feb 2017
Role

: Developer
Environment
: SQL Server 2008, SSIS, SSRS, C#
· Description: SPM is Service Performance Management application to allow users to enrich the exceptions and to generate various SLA/KPI reports on monthly/quarterly basis. This is a windows application. The data is getting loaded into system from various csv files received from trading platforms using ETL process on daily basis.

In this project, my role was to collect requirement directly from client, designing and implement of changes, unit testing, deploying changes in UAT, Production and providing support on the reported issues. 
· Project            : Trust Operation Committee (TOC) Portal
Duration         : Feb 2017 – Till Now
Role

: Developer
Environment
: SQL server 2008 R2, SSIS, SSRS, C#, ASP.NET
· Description: TOC is a web application for Trust Operation Committee. The purpose of this application is to generate various scorecards/reports for the corresponding teams in various formats such as Excel and PDF. The data is getting loaded into this application from various other systems using ETL and script queries.  Earlier user use to create the report in excels manually which we have now automated to reduce their efforts and time.

In this project, my role was to collect requirement directly from client, designing and implement of changes, unit testing, deploying changes in UAT, Production and providing support on the reported issues.

· MCA, Northern Indian Engineering College, GGSIPU, 2012-2015 (70%).
· BCA, JSSATE College, GGSIPU, 2009-2012 (68%)

· SSC, Bharti Public School, CBSE, Mayur Vihar Phase 3, 2006 (69%)

Project Experience: 
 
1. ​iSikCure 

    ​Description​ :- ​iSikCure is a mobile solution that offers convenience and choice for households & 
family members to reach, pay & communicate with trusted healthcare service providers (doctors, 
laboratories, pharmacies) and payers (employers, insurers). 

     ​Role :- ​Team Member / Developer 

    ​Team Size :- ​15 

    ​Technology :- Ionic, Angular js, Node js, MongoDB, HTML5, CSS3 

    Responsibilities :- ​Development of cross platform mobile application for doctor and patient 

         Created the web interface for admin, pharmacy and lab. 

         Created services for application. 
 
2. ​Agrowave 

​Description :- ​Agrowave is a eCommerce startup which aims on removing middlemen and lets farmers                
sell their produce to customers. 

Based on farm to business model it helps organising Agriculture supply chain. 
Consists of 2 apps - Customer app and Farmer app and 1 web Admin portal. Working on Customer app 
using Ionic 3, Angular 2. 
     ​Role :- ​Team Member / Developer 

    ​Team Size :- ​6 

    ​Technology :- Ionic 3, HTML, CSS, Angular 2 

    Responsibilities :- ​Creating cross platform mobile application using ionic framework. 

 

3. ​Fitness App 

    ​Description​ :- ​Fitness App is a fitness tracking app.  
     1. Via this Application user’s can track there Steps, Distance travelled, Calories burnt etc. data history. 
    2. It provide 7 days free trial period and after that user have to buy subscription of minimum 1 month to 
continue the usage. 
    3. This app also provides the reward points to user on completing an achievement. 
     ​Role :- ​Team Member / Backend Developer 

    ​Team Size :- ​4 

    ​Technology :- Node js ,MongoDB and Stripe 

    Responsibilities :- ​Creating REST Api’s and Managing Server Data. 

 

 



4. E-Com 

​Description :- ​E-Com Marketplace helps merchant grow their business by connecting them to the               
consumers beyond their local serviceable area. ​E-Com allows the third party sellers to setup their shops                
online on ​E-Com and start selling their products online by using easy to use listing tools. ​E-Com                 
marketplace enables the customers to explore merchants across six different verticals of daily customer              
demand. 

     ​Role :- ​Team Member / Backend Developer 

    ​Team Size :- ​10 

    ​Technology :- Node js ,Postgresql,Stripe and AWS 

    Responsibilities :- ​Creating REST Api’s and Managing Server Data. 

 

5. ​Breathe-Fit 

​Description :- ​Breathe uses concepts from physics and chemistry to specifically target the fat storage                
and fat dissociation mechanisms 

   In apps highlights 
   . Track all forms of activity using data from your smartwatch. 
   . Estimates the amount of insulin released to the blood-stream based on 
     the quantity and type of foods consumed. 
   . Tracks macronutrient values. 
   . Add multiple foods to your diary. 
   . Barcode scanner for store-bought foods and food history list. 
   . Customized dietary solutions. 
 
     ​Role :- ​Team Member / Backend Developer 

    ​Team Size :- ​4 

    ​Technology :- Node js ,MongoDB, Postgresql, Php and IAP 

    Responsibilities :- ​Creating REST Api’s and Managing Server Data.
